Module RMA
Package RMA

Class DBService

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.DBConnection
      • RMA.DBService
  • class DBService
extends DBConnection
    DBService extends the initial core DBConnection class and implements all logic and functionality for accessing the SQL Server back-end database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static DBService instance
      instance is a private static instance of this class used to maintain a single point of access throughout the application.
      private static java.lang.String query
      query contains the most recent String query used on the database.
      private static java.lang.String role
      role contains the String role assigned to the username and password credentials used to initially login to the database.
      private static java.lang.String user
      user contains the String username that was used to log into the database.

      • Fields inherited from class RMA.DBConnection

        cStmt, pStmt, rs

      private DBService​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String instanceName)
      Constructor that takes in a username, password, and instance name, and attempts to create a connection to the database.

      getRMAShipReplacementRepair fetches the boolean value of whether we will be shipping a replacement or repair to the customer referenced in the RMA with the given String ID.

      updateRMAAdditionalInfo updates the requested RMA's details with the given String ID with the updated information passed-in through the StringadditionalInfo parameter.
      void updateRMACreditReplaceRepair​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String creditReplaceRepair)
      updateRMACreditReplaceRepair updates the specified RMA with the passed-in credit, replace, or repair value.
      void updateRMADisposition​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String disposition)
      updateRMADisposition updates the disposition ID stored in the specified RMA using the passed-in String disposition.
      void updateRMADispositionNotes​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String dispositionNotes)
      updateRMADispositionNotes updates the disposition notes stored in the specified RMA using the passed-in String notes.
      void updateRMAEngineeringEvaluation​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String engineeringEvaluation)
      updateRMAEngineeringEvaluation updates the requested RMA's engineering evaluation from an Engineer with the new String passed-in engineering evaluation text.
      void updateRMAInitialEvaluation​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String initialEvaluation)
      updateRMAInitialEvaluation updates the requested RMA's initial evaluation from an Analyst with the new String passed-in initial evaluation text.
      void updateRMALastModified​(java.lang.String rmaId)
      updateRMALastModified updates the LocalDateTime date and time of the RMA's lastModified column to now.
      void updateRMALastModifiedBy​(java.lang.String rmaId)
      updateRMALastModifiedBy updates the String username in the lastModifiedBy column of the RMA with the given ID to the current logged-in user.
      void updateRMAOwner​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String newOwner)
      updateRMAOwner updates the RMA owner in the database for the given RMA ID with the passed-in username.
      void updateRMAProduct​(java.lang.String rmaId, int purchaseOrderProductId)
      updateRMAProduct updates the product being returned in the RMA with the passed-in int id.
      void updateRMAReplacementShipDate​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.time.LocalDate replacementShipDate)
      updateRMAReplacementShipDate updates the LocalDate date with the passed-in date the replacement will be shipped to the customer in the RMA with the specified String ID.
      void updateRMAReplacementTrackingNumber​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String replacementTrackingNumber)
      updateRMAReplacementTrackingNumber updates the specified RMA's tracking number used to ship the replacement product.
      void updateRMAReturnLabelTracker​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String returnLabelTracker)
      updateRMAReturnLabelTracker updates the requested RMA's details with the new passed-in String return label tracking ID.
      void updateRMAReturnQuantity​(java.lang.String rmaId, int returnQuantity)
      updateRMAReturnQuantity updates the int value for the amount of product being returned by the customer for the given String RMA ID.
      void updateRMAReturnReasonCode​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String returnReasonCodeDescription)
      updateRMAReturnReasonCode updates the specified RMA with the passed-in returnReasonCodeDescription ("Code Description").
      void updateRMAShipReplacementRepair​(java.lang.String rmaId, boolean shipReplacementRepair)
      updateRMAShipReplacementRepair updates the RMA with the given String ID with the new shipReplacementRepair boolean value.
      void updateRMAStatus​(java.lang.String rmaId, java.lang.String description)
      updateRMAStatus updates the status assigned to the RMA with the given String ID to the passed-in String description.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBService

        private DBService​(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  java.lang.String instanceName)
           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Constructor that takes in a username, password, and instance name, and attempts to create a connection to the database.
        Parameters:
        username - The String username to use to connect to the database.
        password - The String password to use to connect to the database.
        instanceName - The String SQL Server instance name to connect.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String instanceName)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException

        username - The String username to use to connect to the database.
        password - The String password to use to connect to the database.
        instanceName - The String SQL Server instance name to connect.
        Returns:
        The static instance of DBService stored in the DBService class.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        createRMA creates the initial RMA record in the database using the passed-in information.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The resulting String RMA ID for this request.

      • getRMA

                        throws java.sql.SQLException

        Parameters:
        rmaId - The String ID of the RMA to fetch.
        Returns:
        An RMAListViewModel containing the details of the RMA.
        Throws:

      • getRMAs

        public java.util.ArrayList<RMAListViewModel> getRMAs()
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        getRMAs fetches the list of open RMAs in the database. If the user is an engineer, then the list of RMAs will be all those with an empty engineeringEvaluation in RMADetails. In both cases, if a critical RMA exists (RMA that has not been modified for five or more days), then the list will only show critical RMAs.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of RMAListViewModel containing the RMAs' details.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.

      • createRMADetails

        public void createRMADetails​(java.lang.String rmaId,
                             java.lang.String returnReasonCode,
                             java.lang.String creditReplaceRepair,
                             int purchaseOrderProductId,
                             int returnQuantity,
                             java.lang.String returnLabelTracker,
                             java.lang.String additionalInfo,
                             java.lang.String poNumber,
                             java.lang.String initialEvaluation,
                             java.lang.String engineeringEvaluation,
                             java.lang.String disposition,
                             java.lang.String dispositionNotes,
                             java.lang.String replacementTrackingNumber,
                             java.time.LocalDate replacementShipDate,
                             boolean shipReplacementRepair)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        createRMADetails creates the rmaDetails record associated with the initial RMA record using the passed-in information.
        Parameters:
        rmaId - The String ID of the RMA whose details we are creating.
        returnReasonCode - The String Return Reason Code we are assigning to this RMA.
        creditReplaceRepair - Whether we are deciding to credit, replace, or repair the returned items, saved as a String.
        purchaseOrderProductId - The unique int identifier of the product being returned by the customer.
        returnQuantity - The int amount of product being returned by the customer.
        returnLabelTracker - The String return label tracking number used to ship the product to us.
        additionalInfo - Any additional info needed to process the RMA, entered in by an Analyst. Stored as a String.
        poNumber - The String purchase order number being referenced in this RMA.
        initialEvaluation - The String initial evaluation by an Analyst of the product's condition and the RMA request.
        engineeringEvaluation - The String evaluation of the returned product by an Engineer.
        disposition - The String disposition to assign to the returned product by an Analyst.
        dispositionNotes - Any additional notes on the disposition written by an Analyst. Stored as a String.
        replacementTrackingNumber - The String tracking number for the replacement being sent back to the customer.
        replacementShipDate - The LocalDate date the replacement was or will be shipped back to the customer.
        shipReplacementRepair - A boolean indicating whether or not we will be shipping back a replacement or repair to the customer.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database or an issue with the SQL query.

      • getRMACustomerName

        public java.lang.String getRMACustomerName​(java.lang.String rmaId)
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        getRMACustomerName returns the customer name associated with an RMA ID, through its PO number and the PO number's associated address ID.
        Parameters:
        rmaId - The RMA whose customer name we wish to look up.
        Returns:
        A String containing the name of the customer associated with the PO and address in the RMA.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database or an issue with the SQL query.

      • getRMABusinessName

        public CustomerAddress getRMABusinessName​(java.lang.String rmaId)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        getRMABusinessName returns a CustomerAddress set to show the business name associated with the RMA whose ID we are searching, through its PO number and the PO number's associated address ID.
        Parameters:
        rmaId - The RMA whose business name we wish to look up.
        Returns:
        A CustomerAddress set to show the name of the business associated with the PO and address in the RMA.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database or an issue with the SQL query.

      • getRMAPONumber
